mapper.select: SELECT CHRR_ID , CHRR_PWD , CHRR_NM , COMPANY_ID , UYN , DEPTNM FROM TB_EM_PC_CHRR WHERE CHRR_ID = #{chrrId} AND UYN = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_ROW_CNT FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS WHERE MAJOR_CLASS ='TOTAL'
AND TO_CHAR(PRC_DT,'YYYYMM') = REPLACE(#{textPrcDt},'-','')

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_ROW_CNT FROM TB_EM_IMR_QUERY_HISTORY A INNER JOIN TB_EM_PC_CHRR B ON A.CHRR_ID = B.CHRR_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.CUST_ID = #{custId}
AND TO_CHAR(A.IPDT_TIME,'YYYYMMDD') >= REPLACE(#{startPrcDt},'-','')
AND TO_CHAR(A.IPDT_TIME,'YYYYMMDD') <= REPLACE(#{endPrcDt},'-','')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EM_PC_CHRR ( CHRR_ID, COMPANY_ID, CHRR_NM, DEPTNM, UYN, RG_DTM, RG_ENO, CHRR_PWD, IPDT_TIME, RG_REASON ) VALUES ( #{chrrId}, #{companyId}, #{chrrNm}, #{deptnm}, 'Y', SYSDATE(), #{rgId}, #{chrrPwd}, SYSDATE(), #{rgReason} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_EM_PC_CHRR SET UYN = 'N', RG_REASON = CONCAT(RG_REASON,TO_CHAR(RG_DTM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')), RG_DTM = SYSDATE() WHERE ID_NO = #{idNo}
mapper.select: SELECT PRC_DT, CASE WHEN MASK_PRG_STSC > 20 AND MASK_PRG_STSC < 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PRC_CN, CASE WHEN MASK_PRG_STSC > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ERR_CN, CASE WHEN USER_CONFIRM ='99' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS VERIFY_CN, CASE WHEN USER_CONFIRM ='99' AND USER_UPDATE_YN ='01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS VERIFY_UPDATE_CN, INTVISION_IMR FROM TB_EM_IMR_MASK_OBJ WHERE PRC_DT < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE(),'YYYYMMDD') AND PRC_DT > ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) > 0 THEN (SELECT MAX(PRC_DT) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) ELSE '0000000'END ) AND MASK_PRG_STSC > 20 ORDER BY PRC_DT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS ( PRC_DT, MAJOR_CLASS, PRC_DT_CNT, PRC_CN, NO_CN, ERR_CN, VERIFY_CN, VERIFY_UPDATE_CN, A_Y, A_N, B_Y, B_N, C_Y, C_N, D_Y, D_N, E_Y, E_N, TM_RECV_Y, TM_RECV_N, SMS_RECV_Y, SMS_RECV_N, DM_RECV_Y, DM_RECV_N, EMAIL_RECV_Y, EMAIL_RECV_N, TM_OFFER_Y, TM_OFFER_N, EMAIL_OFFER_Y, EMAIL_OFFER_N, DM_OFFER_Y, DM_OFFER_N, SMS_OFFER_Y, SMS_OFFER_N, RG_DTM, RG_ENO ) VALUES ( #{prcDt}, 'TOTAL', #{prcDtCnt}, #{prcCn}, #{prcDtCnt}-#{prcCn}, #{errCn}, #{verifyCn}, #{verifyUpdateCn}, #{ay}, #{an}, #{by}, #{bn}, #{cy}, #{cn}, #{dy}, #{dn}, #{ey}, #{en}, #{tmRecvY}, #{tmRecvN}, #{smsRecvY}, #{smsRecvN}, #{dmRecvY}, #{dmRecvN}, #{emailRecvY}, #{emailRecvN}, #{tmOfferY}, #{tmOfferN}, #{dmOfferY}, #{dmOfferN}, #{emailOfferY}, #{emailOfferN}, #{smsOfferY}, #{smsOfferN}, SYSDATE(), 'system' )

INSERT INTO TB_EM_IMR_QUERY_HISTORY ( CHRR_ID , PRC_DT , ELEMENTID , CUST_ID , CONTRACT_ID , QUERY_REASON , IPDT_TIME ) VALUES ( #{chrrId}, DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), #{elementId}, #{custId}, #{contractId}, #{queryReason}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT PRC_DT FROM TB_EM_IMR_MASK_OBJ WHERE PRC_DT < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE(),'YYYYMMDD') AND PRC_DT > ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) > 0 THEN (SELECT MAX(PRC_DT) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) ELSE '0000000'END ) AND MASK_PRG_STSC > 20 GROUP BY PRC_DT ORDER BY PRC_DT

SELECT COUNT(PRC_DT) TOT_ROW_CNT FROM TB_EM_IMR_MASK_OBJ WHERE PRC_DT < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE(),'YYYYMMDD') AND PRC_DT > ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) > 0 THEN (SELECT MAX(PRC_DT) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) ELSE '0000000'END ) AND MASK_PRG_STSC > 20 ORDER BY PRC_DT

SELECT MIN(PRC_DT) ST_PRC_DT, TO_CHAR(DATE_ADD(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL -1 DAY),'YYYYMMDD') ED_PRC_DT FROM TB_EM_IMR_MASK_OBJ WHERE PRC_DT < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE(),'YYYYMMDD') AND PRC_DT > ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) > 0 THEN (SELECT MAX(PRC_DT) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) ELSE '0000000'END ) AND MASK_PRG_STSC > 20 ORDER BY PRC_DT
